61.title: IT Project Manager
61.description:
Want to shape the world of eCommerce with us?
We work with market leaders, like SAP, Samsung, Bosch, and many others, who perceive technology as their key component to success. We are looking for an experienced and enthusiastic IT Project Manager to add to our growing Brand Active team.
Our ideal candidate will be passionate about e-commerce, and open to gathering knowledge of Shopify.



Salary: 40-75PLN/h net + VAT (B2B)

You will be responsible for:


managing IT project - eCommerce (online stores, PIM, PWA systems)

organizing of work of project teams (designers, developers, testers)

implementing projects according to the Agile philosophy based on the Scrum and Kanban methodologies
managing projects in the Jira system and improvement of management systems

developing teams in terms of organizational and soft skills

cooperating with eCommerce Managers
implementing micro-services projects in the headless commerce approach

having contact with clients and partners during implementations
creating the company's strategy and defining goals


testing the presented assumptions and requirements made by developers

We require:

at least 3 years of experience in managing IT projects
practical knowledge of agile management methodologies, i.e. Scrum, Kanban
experience in cooperation with clients according to the Agile philosophy and time & material settlements
good focus on eCommerce software
ability to manage project teams of more than 5 people

budget, time, and scope management skills
excellent work organization (calendar, e-mail, telephone, checklists)
good command of English (at least B2) and Polish(at least C1)
knowledge of BrowserStack


We offer:

B2B contract or employment contract
development in the latest eCommerce technologies, i.e. Shopify Plus, PIM Akeneo, PWA Scrum, and Agile certification
ambitious global eCommerce projects for well-known brands the possibility of developing a personal brand (publications, lectures)
clear organizational culture and transparent strategy
English lessons with a native speaker 
private medical care 
flexible working system working remotely/hybrid/from the office

Why Divante?
With you onboard, we can impact eCommerce globally and drive both the online and offline retail worlds! We’re a cutting-edge eCommerce company, with more than 250 people on board.
Here, you’ll find people who are open to sharing their knowledge and expertise. You'll meet the bold ones, who are eager to learn the latest technology.
We were born as a services company, but over time we’ve built many successful open-source products like Open Loyalty, Vue Storefront, Storefront UI. We also collaborate with SAP on a dedicated PWA application for SAP Hybris - Spartacus. In open source we trust.
You’ll feel right at home if you’re brave, driven, and share similar values to us: https://divante.com/about-us#values

What’s next?
After receiving your CV we will reach out to you for a short call. One of our recruiters will take care of you during the whole recruitment process and will answer all your questions.


If you have any questions right now, feel free to contact our recruiter Kasia at kpawlowicz@divante.pl

Does this position sound like a dream job to you? Don't hesitate and apply by using the form below.

About Us
Evolution is a market-leading developer and provider of products and services for online casino entertainment. 66.title: Java Developer (Remote)
66.description:
🌍 Hello World!The Codest is a team of true technology enthusiasts, and we currently have +40 people on board. We create custom software for clients from all over the world (mostly Western Europe). We have 12 years of experience on the market and a lot of enthusiasm for further work!📈 We support various projects.One of them is a fintech project we are working on an online banking application for leading financial groups in Asia. The platform is equipped with banking modules, data management functions and customer service.In another project, we are supporting a digital wellness platform that already has 4 million users.Our engineers are also working for a Swedish client - the Nordic region's leading SaaS service in spend analysisWe are looking for candidates with varied experience - from MID to Principal SE.

Advanced English in speaking and writing (you will be working with international clients only)

☑️ Nice to have:

1800 PLN per year as a development budget
position in foreign projects where you will have a significant impact
cool education events (internal and external) organized by The Codest
great atmosphere and integration parties

📈 Development opportunities:

Mentoring - we have a clearly defined career path and level of skills that must be mastered in order to achieve the next levels of "seniority". Throughout the process, the manager plays the role of a mentor and helps at each stage.

Offer

67.title: Senior Software Engineer
67.description:
CloudFerro jest dostawcą innowacyjnych usług przetwarzania w chmurze. Zapewnia i obsługuje chmury obliczeniowe dla wyspecjalizowanych rynków, m.in. dla europejskiego przemysłu kosmicznego, badań klimatu i nauki. Posiada duże doświadczenie w przechowywaniu i przetwarzaniu wielkich zbiorów danych, w tym wielopetabajtowych repozytoriów danych satelitarnych obserwacji Ziemi.
 Z rozwiązań CloudFerro korzystają wiodące firmy i instytucje naukowe w Europie z różnych sektorów rynku, przetwarzające wielkie zbiory danych: Europejska Agencja Kosmiczna (ESA), EUMETSAT, Europejskie Centrum Prognoz Średnioterminowych (ECMWF), Mercator Ocean International, Niemiecka Agencja Aero-Kosmiczna (DLR), EGI i wiele innych.
Więcej informacji: www.cloudferro.com

Cały czas się rozwijamy, a obecnie do naszego zespołu szukamy:
Senior Software Engineer Do Twoich zadań należeć będzie:
Rozwijanie systemu do efektywnego rozproszenia obliczeń polegających na przetwarzaniu zdjęć satelitarnych (projekty dla Europejskiej Agencji Kosmicznej). 
Praca nad backendem obsługującym duże ilości danych.
Rozwijanie systemu przetwarzającego zdarzenia bilingowe.
Dodawanie nowych funkcji do aplikacji oraz ulepszenia techniczne, takie jak refaktoryzacja lub zwiększenie zasięgu testów.
Jak pracujemy:
Na co dzień używamy: Python3.8+, SQLAlchemyDjango, DjangoRestFramework, PostgreSQL, Redis, RabbitMQ,
Nasz dział Software Development składa się z blisko 50 programistów, testerów, analityków i devopsów.
Opieramy się na narzędziach: Kubernetes, Tanka, ArgoCD.
Ważną rolę w naszej pracy odgrywa automatyzacja.
Nasz monitoring oparty jest o Prometheus + ELK.
Praktykujemy Code Review, CI/CD, dobre praktyki, Testy 
Pracujemy na Linux.
Pracujemy w oparciu o Scrum/Agile.
Korzystamy z narzędzi: Git, Confluence, Jira.
 Szukamy developerów którzy:
Posiadają min. 6-letnie doświadczenie programistyczne w projektach komercyjnych.
Ukończyli studia informatyczne/pokrewne (lub w trakcie studiów).
Piszą czytelny i wydajny kod (preferowany język: Python lub chęć nauki).
Mają dobre podstawy algorytmów i struktur danych.
Znają SQL.
Posiadają znajomość Linux.
Mają doświadczenie w pisaniu testów jednostkowych zgodnie z TDD.
Chcą się stale rozwijać i aktualizować swoją wiedzę.
Swobodnie porozumiewają się w języku angielskim.
Dlaczego warto do nas dołączyć:
Pracując u nas będziesz realizować projekty dla europejskiego przemysłu kosmicznego, badań klimatu i nauki. 
Przyjmujemy hybrydowy lub zdalny model pracy, jesteśmy elastyczni jeśli chodzi o godziny pracy. 
Jesteśmy otwarci na nowe pomysły, omawiamy wspólnie rozwiązania, przez co uczymy się i mamy możliwość stałego rozwoju.
Dajemy wysoki stopień autonomii w zakresie organizacji pracy.
Będziesz mieć realny wpływ na decyzje techniczne i biznesowe w swoim projekcie.
Będziesz pracować z ludźmi, na których zawsze możesz liczyć – mamy na pokładzie najwyższej klasy specjalistów i ekspertów w swoich dziedzinach.
Oferujemy atrakcyjne wynagrodzenie w oparciu o stabilne formy zatrudnienia. 
Otrzymasz pakiet socjalny – opiekę medyczną, multisport, ubezpieczenie na życie. 
Będziesz mieć możliwość korzystania z zajęć językowych.

70.title: Java Developer all levels
70.description:
Dołącz do naszego zespołu Modern Software Engineering będącego częścią komórki Cloud First Poland, w którym realizujemy innowacyjne projekty dla naszych partnerów biznesowych w Polsce i za granicą. Budujemy oraz transformujemy systemy IT naszych klientów, tworząc nowoczesne, kompleksowe rozwiązania IT skali enterprise z wykorzystaniem najnowszych technologii oraz metodyk wytwórczych. W naszych rozwiązaniach wykorzystujemy rozproszoną architekturę, mikroserwisy, rozwiązania chmurowe oraz konteneryzację. Realizujemy projekty dla branży finansowej, sprzedażowej (retail) oraz telekomunikacyjnej.

Pracując u nas będziesz miał(a) okazję:

Podnosić swoje kwalifikacje dzięki pracy z ekspertami technicznymi w Polsce i na świecie,
Tworzyć rozwiązania dla klientów rozpoznawalnych na całym świecie,
Budować aplikacje oparte o architekturę rozproszoną z wykorzystaniem nowoczesnych standardów i technologii: REST API, EDA, DDD, RedHat OpenShift

Czego od Ciebie oczekujemy?

Minimum roku doświadczenia komercyjnego w pisaniu aplikacji w JAVA 8/11
Praktycznej znajomości Spring (Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security), Hibernate, Maven, GIT
Znajomości standardów REST API
Znajomości i stosowania dobrych praktyk programistycznych, takich jak clean code oraz wzorców projektowych
Umiejętności korzystania z relacyjnych baz danych
Dobrej znajomości j. polskiego oraz angielskiego
Umiejętności pracy w zwinnym zespole oraz znajomości procesu wytwórczego oprogramowania
​
Mile widziane: 

Znajomość technologii chmurowych Azure / GCP / AWS
Znajomość podejścia DDD, TDD
Znajomość nierelacyjnych baz danych np. MongoDB, Redis
Znajomość wzorców EDA w oparciu o np. Kafka
Doświadczenie w budowie aplikacji w architekturze mikroserwisów, z wykorzystaniem np. Kubernetees, Openshift
Doświadczenie w pracy z architektami IT i/lub w roli lidera technicznego

72.title: Senior Product Manager Integration Platform
72.description:
Company Description
Our vision here at Tesco is to become every customer's favorite way to shop, whether they are at home, in store, on the move … anywhere in their world. With our unrivalled physical and digital assets and an ambitious investment programme, we aim to become the world's best multi-channel retailer.
Everything is underpinned by our continuous drive for the best tools and technology to deliver our vision. We’re driving innovation, evolving our product development process and transforming our technology to become the world’s leading e-commerce business.
We need people who share our ambition to deliver for our customers. We want passionate, talented and hardworking individuals willing to take the initiative and drive us forwards. In return we offer a huge challenge, strong support, a great team, an excellent benefit package, and significant career development opportunities.
Joining us means playing a part in defining; building and launching an ambitious roadmap of digital products that could affect the lives of millions of people over the years to come.
If that sounds exciting then we'd love to hear from you.
Job Description

About the Integration Platform
We are seeking a talented Senior Product Manager to lead the development and management of our Integration Platform products in a colleague domain. This system will be facilitating the integration of different enterprise applications, systems, and data sources within an organization. Integration Platform give us set of tools, services and framework that enable data orchestration, data transformation, message routing and other integration capabilities. By connecting disparate systems and applications, it will help organization improve operational efficiency, streamline business processes, and enhance data visibility and accessibility.

The Role – Senior Product Manager – Integration Platform
Whilst specific responsibilities will be dependent upon the changing needs of the Tesco business, the following provides an overview of the role’s key responsibilities and measures:

Have complete ownership of a complex enterprise integration platform involving multiple internal / external stakeholders and drive the Product strategy and execution for those APIs.
Work with your team and stakeholders to align the strategic priorities, dependencies and roadmap across your product.
Quickly build domain knowledge and assess new opportunities (gathering ideas, research, carrying out analysis, refining and prioritising new requirements).
Steer sprint / release planning sessions in conjunction with engineering counterparts to effectively deliver maximum business value with the least effort.
Lead discovery work around minimum viable products (MVP) for new features, collaborating with delivery teams and internal / external stakeholders to prototype and validating MVP.
Help the delivery team in breaking down complex pieces of work and create epics and stories to break down large programmes into smaller, deliverable chunks of value that can be delivered faster.
Provide leadership and direction to cross-functional delivery teams on short-term tasks / near-term priorities.
Be accountable for the performance / adoption of the Integration Platform and work towards increasing the customer base.
Provide support and coaching to Product Managers as well as peers.
This role will best suit an individual who enjoys working as part of a team, is well organised and pragmatic, a lateral thinker with an inquisitive mind and motivated to make change things for the better and, most importantly, puts our customers first.
Contribute towards hiring / building a great pool of Product Managers for the Colleague Transformation team and the wider Tesco product function.
As business needs change over time; manage other products within the colleague domain.

Qualifications

Key Skills and Experience
You’ll need to have demonstrated experience of:

Managing API driven enterprise integration platform in a complex environment.
Strong technical acumen and understanding of integration tools, methodologies, and technologies.
Articulating a product strategy in terms of consumer and business value.
Experience and understanding of agile techniques to deliver the product.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills – you must be able to articulate complex concepts to a diverse audience.
The ability to influence without authority.
Having proven success in working on unstructured problems, defining hypothesis, creating MVPs, running experiments and analyzing results to drive data-driven decisions.
Product management best practice and methodologies.
Technical competence to influence and understand the solution context and approach and aid engineering in estimating the complexity of work being requested.
Understanding the impact tech debt is causing, and the value tech upgrades can bring in, and can hold objective conversations with your technology counterparts to prioritize it during any sprint.
Prioritizing and decision-making skills, demonstrating experience of having made good decisions / judgements around business priorities and resource allocation.

Personal

Flexibility, ability to plan and organize, responsiveness, creativity, self-starter. 
Able to build solid working relationships with peers and senior leadership.
Ability to demonstrate strong written, verbal communication and presentation skills to all levels of seniority and disciplines within the organisation. 
The successful candidate will have a tenacious can-do, will-do mentality.
Whilst being personally robust and willing to challenge the status quo, you will work closely with other team members and must be able to bring people on a journey with you.

Additional Information

What’s in it for you

Tesco is a diverse and exciting employer, dedicated to being #aplacetogeton, providing career-defining opportunities to all of our colleagues. If you chose to join our business, we will provide you with:

Permanent contract from the go – as a sign of our trust in your abilities.
Up to 20% yearly salary bonus – for employment contract colleagues only – based on both individual and business performance
Extensive private healthcare - complex care package including a wide range of specialists, medical services and free flu vaccination
Cafeteria & Multisport – subsidized MyBenefit cafeteria platform with option to use the funds on multisport card.
Relocation Help - professional service to secure relevant working permits and other necessary documents;
Learning opportunities - certified technical training and learning platforms like Udemy, Pluralsight and O’reily.
Referral Bonus – You’ll get 4500 PLN for each colleague you successfully refer to work with us.
Optional life insurance – wide variety of insurance options from our partner, available optionally at a significant discount.

73.title: Senior Analyst in Market Risk
73.description:
Would you like to join a team of highly skilled analysts and play a key role in our risk management? We are now looking for a Senior Analyst to further drive and develop our market risk processes and risk analysis, to meet European best-practice standards. About this opportunityThe Market and Counterparty Credit Risk Analytics team sits in the Middle Office/1st Line of Defence function of Nordea, overseeing both Markets and Treasury activities. We deliver value by developing the frameworks around market risk and counterparty credit risk as well as applying our technical skils to create automated analytics solutions and providing risk analysis for stakeholder. The position offers much interaction with both our Front Office colleagues and the opportunity to make a difference in how risk is seen and used to steer our business. You will join a group of seasoned risk experts within the biggest Bank in the Nordics.
There is lots of opportunity to shape the position and title around a good and ambitious candidate.
Examples of what you could be doing:

Providing expertise services to stakeholders on financial risk (market risk and/or counterparty credit risk) and related risk governance
Taking part in the design/implementation of our analytical risk tools and risk analysis
Driving periodic and ad hoc market risk analysis and limit reviews and present to relevant committees
Driving/Coordinating  setting and optimization of risk limits between Front Office and 2nd Line of Defence  
Productionizing and automating the risk solutions with tools like Python, SQL and Alteryx

The role is based in Warsaw, Poland. 
Who you are
Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.   
To succeed in this role, we believe that you:

Have a keen interest in risk topics related to financial markets and products and are able to understand how financial products and business strategies translate into our risk profile  
Are a self-driven team player who proactively reaches out to collaborate with stakeholders in order to seek alignment and solutions to complex risk topics
Are ambitious, have the right attitude and willingness to grow and develop the role and the team 

Your experience and background:  

3+ years of experience working in the banking industry, preferably in a role working with market risk, counterparty credit risk or financial markets
Have at least a basic understanding of market risk (in the Trading book or Banking book -IRRBB) or counterparty credit risk
Master’s degree in a relevant field, e.g. Economics, Finance, Engineering or Mathematics
Excellent communication skills in English (minimum C1), both verbal and written. 
Working experience with Python, SQL or similar.  
Any prior experience with workflow tools (e.g. Alteryx, DataStage) and visualization tools (Qlik/Power BI) is seen as an advantage

The right attitude and willingness to grow in the role is more important than formal education.  If this sounds like you, get in touch!

77.description:

The Infrastructure Security Architect will design and follow documented reference architectures and finalize security designs for new applications, integrations and supporting infrastructure. This is done in collaboration with the Enterprise Security Architect and Security Engineering teams.Key Responsibilities

Assets analysis

Would you like to in a robust, dynamic and friendly group of experienced colleagues by taking part and/or managing various projects aiming to improve efficiency of our deliveries? We are now looking for a (Senior) Change and Process Specialist/Controller with PowerBI to support us in our journey towards becoming an even more valued business partner by experimenting with new technologies and creating an efficient management reporting information to our Nordic stakeholders.
In Nordea, we’re harnessing the power of technology to reinvent the future of banking. A tech revolution is underway – and you can make an impact. Though we’re a Nordic bank, we’re also one of the largest IT employers in Tricity and Warsaw. We add value by developing and providing high quality process support services towards Nordea’s finance organisation and financial market regulators. As (Senior) Change and Process Specialist/Controller with PowerBI making Nordea’s billions of data records accessible and understandable for business controllers, management support, leaders and other colleagues in Nordea.What you’ll be doing:

You’ll join a constantly growing team, full of driven, young and digital minded specialist. The role is based in Łódź; Gdańsk; Gdynia; Warszawa.Who you areCollaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.   To succeed in this role, we believe that you:

94.title: Senior Salesforce Consultant
94.description:
Twoje obecna praca jest nudna, a może szukasz nowych wyzwań?  Dołącz do Accenture i stań się częścią ogromnego ekosystemu projektów Salesforce. Pracujemy dla największych firm na świecie wdrażając rozwiązania używane przez setki milionów ludzi każdego dnia. Wchodząc do Twojego osiedlowego sklepu, logując się do banku, czy też zamawiając bilety lotnicze jest ogromna szansa, że właśnie korzystasz z Salesforce’a wdrożonego przez nasz zespół :)Jeśli lubisz dynamiczne środowisko pracy -  mamy mnóstwo projektów, wyzwania - u nas łatwo zmienić ścieżkę kariery oraz pracę w dobrze zorganizowanym, międzynarodowym otoczeniu - aplikuj do nas! Oddzwonimy i porozmawiamy o konkretach!Oferujemy różne formy współpracy, pracę w naszych nowoczesnych biurach w Krakowie lub Warszawie, a także w pełni zdalnie.

Czym będziesz się zajmować?

Analizowaniem i uzgadnianiem wymagań biznesowych i user stories z klientem.
Projektowaniem automatyzacji procesów biznesowych w oparciu o platformę Salesforce.
Projektowaniem integracji Salesforce z systemami legacy klienta oraz platformami 3rd party.
Wsparciem analitycznym dla klienta i zespołu programistycznego - od Ciebie zależeć będzie kształt rozwiązania, wykorzystanie standardowych funkcji, zakres w jakim użyjecie podejścia „low code”, a gdzie zdecydujecie się na rozwiązanie custom.
Konfigurowaniem rozwiązania i automatyzacją procesów przy pomocy narzędzi deklaratywnych Salesforce.

Czego od Ciebie oczekujemy?

Minimum 4 lata doświadczenia w pracy z technologią Salesforce.
Biegłej znajomości narzędzi konfiguracyjnych Salesforce.
Praktycznej znajomości ekosystemu Salesforce (Sales, Service, Marketing, Experience, Commerce, CPQ, Industries i inne) i doświadczenia we wdrażaniu złożonych rozwiązań w oparciu o dostępne chmury oraz custom development.
Doświadczenia w implementacji procesów biznesowych, pracy z klientem i zespołami programistów oraz zrozumienia kluczowych koncepcji architektonicznych i ekosystemu Salesforce.
Bardzo dobrej znajomości języka angielskiego, umiejętności komunikacji i chęci pracy w międzynarodowym środowisku.
Doświadczenie poparte certyfikatami Salesforce - mile widziane.

Co możemy Ci zaoferować?

Udział w realizacji projektów na globalną skalę dla największych międzynarodowych firm z Fortune500 z użyciem najnowszych rozwiązań i narzędzi technologicznych.
Pracę u największego partnera Salesforce na świecie.
Stanie się częścią zespołu profesjonalistów Salesforce.
Elastyczna forma zatrudnienia (B2B lub umowa o pracę).
Szeroki pakiet szkoleniowy - zapewniamy pełne finansowanie kursów i certyfikacji Salesforce, szkolenia techniczne i miękkie.
Aktywności pozaprojektowe w ramach Happiness at work oraz inicjatywy sportowe.
Prywatną opiekę medyczną, ubezpieczenie na życie oraz program akcji pracowniczych.
Dostęp do platformy MyBenefit (możliwość skorzystania z szerokiej gamy produktów i usług, w tym karty Multisport).
Płatny program poleceń pracowników.
Indywidualne wsparcie Career counselora i elastyczną ścieżkę rozwoju zawodowego.
Employee Assistance Program – bezpłatne wsparcie w jednorazowych konsultacjach prawniczych, finansowych oraz psychologicznych.

97.title: Head of DevOps
97.description:
Job description
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Head of DevOps Engineer with AWS for our Customer. You will be responsible to build a cohesive and high-performing team. You should be able to identify each team member’s strengths and weaknesses and create a work environment that promotes collaboration and continuous learning. The ideal candidate should have experience in automating infrastructure and processes, as well as expertise in Terraform, CI/CD processes, Git, databases, Docker, and Kubernetes. This role requires a strong understanding of IP networks, security, and deployment strategies. Also, you should be able effectively communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders. You should be able to explain technical concepts in a way that is easy for others to understand.

Project description
This project centers around managing web applications on cloud infrastructure, with a key focus on leveraging serverless computing (e.g., AWS Lambda/Azure Functions) and containerization (using Docker/Kubernetes). The primary responsibility is overseeing our AWS-based infrastructure, which includes managing Kubernetes clusters on EKS, running Linux/Windows workloads, operating RDS databases for both MS SQL and Postgres, and utilizing AWS services such as WAF, Shield, and Firewall Manager.

Responsibilities

Design, Implement, and maintain CI/CD processes
Utilize Terraform and Ansible for infrastructure as code management
Manage databases, including AWS RDS, DynamoDB, and others, including performance tuning and backup/recovery processes
Maintain and troubleshoot Docker containers and Kubernetes clusters
Monitor and optimize system performance, ensuring high availability and scalability
Automate repetitive tasks using scripting languages like Python or Bash
Ensure the security of all AWS resources and implement best practices for data protection
Analyze and troubleshoot production issues and implement solutions to resolve them.
Collaborate with the development team to ensure the smooth delivery of new features and enhancements
Stay current with the latest AWS and DevOps technologies.

Requirements
Must have:
Excellent cohesive team-building skills.
At least 5 years of experience in DevOps and AWS environment
Experience in any automating development pipelines, and working experience in Team City / AppVeyor / Octopus Deploy / will be an additional plus.
Experience with cloud-hosted infrastructure
Experience with container orchestration (Kubernetes / ECS)
Working experience with Git repository
Strong experience in automating infrastructure and processes using Terraform
Experience with databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.)
Good understanding of IP networks and security best practices
Good knowledge of monitoring tools, DataDog will be an additional plus.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Experience in the administration of Linux and Windows operating systems
Fluency in English.

Nice to have:

Security – Network Security (Firewalls, Anti-Virus) and Application security (e.g. Defending against the OWASP Top 10)
Serverless applications (e.g. AWS Lambda / AWS API Gateway / Azure Functions)
Linux and Windows Sys Admin and hosting (e.g. nginx / IIS).

99.title: Remote Mid/Senior SQL Server Admin
99.description: https://vimeo.com/haddad/review/344321418/30663aa8d1Podstawowym obowiązkiem na tym stanowisku jest monitoring, zarządzanie, optymalizacja i administracja bazami danych MS SQL.Dodatkowo wsparcie użytkowników i współpraca z zespołami programistycznymi.Monitoring sieci, serwerów, dokumentacja...Zarządzanie systemami zmienia się dynamicznie ze względu na specyfikę branży odzieżowej, rozsiania struktury biznesu oraz infrastruktury sieciowej na wielu kontynentach, w większości Ameryka Północna, Europa, Azja z własnymi serwerowniami wraz z pewnymi hybrydowymi rozwiązaniami chmurowymi Azure.Oferujemy: prywatną opiekę medyczną, 21 płatnych dni urlopu w ciągu roku, pełne oprogramowanie i sprzęt, nielimitowane szkolenia i indywidualny rozwój. wolność w wyborze narzędzi i metodologii, przyjazna atmosfera oparta na wzajemnym zaufaniu.Interesuje nas wyłącznie długotrwała, wieloletnia współpraca.Rekrutacja:- Spotkanie zapoznawcze (główne) – godzina czasu – telekonferencja ze mną i szefem działu administratorów w języku polskim. Możemy na chwilę przełączyć się na język angielski celem zbadania poziomu. Na spotkaniu tym obustronnie omawiamy też tematy merytoryczne.- spotkanie drugie (po tygodniu od pierwszej rozmowy, chyba, że ustalimy inaczej) – w przypadku obustronnego zainteresowania dopinamy szczegóły merytoryczne i samego zatrudnienia.

100.title: Senior Java Full Stack Developer
100.description:
About the vacancy
Nortal is looking for an experienced Senior Java Full Stack Developer for long-term and full-time employment!About our client
Our client, TUI, is a global business with over 70 000 people on board, great history and challenging plans for building a digital future. TUI is the largest leisure, travel and tourism company globally, and it owns travel agencies, hotels, airlines, cruise ships and retail shops.
About the projectYou will join Web, Engagement global team at TUI responsible for the Web technologies across all holiday products and all TUI regions which owns several web applications that serve millions of users per year, generating billions in revenue for TUI. You will work with the multi-disciplinary team of experts across Architecture, Engineering, DevOps, and Agile Delivery who are located, and providing technical services, across the UK, Ireland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Belgium, and The Netherlands. The project is a web platform (Hybris) and the client’s strategy is to embrace new technologies to prepare for the future and deliver for the now. Client is looking at moving to Modular Architecture which will provide benefits to the way we work along with delivering faster and more efficiently for our business and customers.

Design patterns, OOP, Development principles
